metadata.title: CVE-2020-10575 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Janus through 0.9.1. plugins/janus_videocall.c in the VideoCall plugin mishandles session management because a race condition causes some references to be freed too early or too many times.

criterions.comment: janus package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
